alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...SOUTHWESTERN CRENSHAW...EAST CENTRAL CONECUH AND NORTHERN COVINGTON COUNTIES... At 410 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Level, or 10 miles northwest of Andalusia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... River Falls, Red Level, Dozier, Heath and Gantt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
